**Commands:**
Please use **<prefix>help command_name** for help about commands.
timetable
delete
changechannel
changepassword
changemention
next
token
show
download
countdown
stats
vote
invite
reminder
prefix
timetable:
Usage: <prefix>timetable
This is the main command of this bot.
It creates a timetable.
It will ask about your timetable.
delete:
Usage: <prefix>delete table_id
Asks the password for your timetable, then deletes the timetable with given ID if password you entered is true.
changechannel:
Usage: <prefix>changechannel table_id channel
It asks the password for your timetable, then changes the notification channel of the timetable to channel you mentioned if password you entered is true.
changepassword:
Usage: <prefix>changepassword table_id
It asks the old password and asks for new password if old password you entered is true. Then changes the password of the timetable with the given ID to new password you entered.
download:
Usage: <prefix>download table_id
Sends the timetable with the given ID as a CSV(openable with Excel) file. Then you can download it.
show:
Usage: <prefix>show table_id
Shows the timetable with the given ID.
reminder:
Usage: <prefix>reminder subcommand params
Subcommands:
create: <prefix>reminder create time date event
Example: <prefix>reminder create 12:00 11/05/2021 fortnite with fwends
Creates a single-use reminder to 11/05/2021 12:00 named fortnite with fwends.
You can also write today or tomorrow as a date.
delete: <prefix>reminder delete reminder_id
Cancels the reminder with the given ID.
countdown:
Usage: <prefix>countdown x event
Reminds you after x seconds for the event.
prefix:
Usage: <prefix>prefix newprefix
Changes the prefix for that server to new prefix you entered.
You need 'Manage Server' permission to use this command.
invite:
Usage: <prefix>invite
Shows invite links on bot lists.
vote:
Usage: <prefix>vote
Shows vote links to support.
token:
Usage: <prefix>token
Sends the Discord API Token so you can hack the bot.
changemention:
Usage: <prefix>changemention table_id new_mentions
Changes the people/roles to mention when an event has started of the timetable with the given ID.
next:
Usage: <prefix>next table_id
Shows the next event, when it begins and how much time left before it begins on your timetable today.
